original_title: 快盗戦隊ルパンレンジャーVS警察戦隊パトレンジャー ~GIRLFRIENDS ARMY~
overview: Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger ～GIRLFRIENDS ARMY～ is a Hyper Battle DVD, that showcase various features of the series and its armament. The DVD will feature the series’ heroines, Umika Hayami and Tsukasa Myoujin.
title: Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger ~GIRLFRIENDS ARMY~
